summary: This document appears to be an Amazon.com order confirmation and a FedEx shipping label from September 2005. The Amazon order, placed by Jeffrey Epstein, includes books with titles related to erotic servitude and slavery. The FedEx label shows a shipment from Epstein's New York address to his Palm Beach address.

events.title: Amazon Book Order
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein placed an order on Amazon.com for three books related to BDSM and erotic servitude.

events.title: FedEx Shipment
events.description: A FedEx Priority Overnight shipment was sent from Jeffrey Epstein's New York address to his Palm Beach address.

locations: 358 El Brillo Way, Palm Beach, Florida 33480
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein purchased books titled 'SM 101: A Realistic Introduction', 'SlaveCraft: Roadmaps for Erotic Servitude', and 'Training With Miss Abernathy: A Workbook for Erotic Slaves and Their Owners' from Amazon.com in September 2005.
The shipping and billing address for the Amazon order was Epstein's Palm Beach, Florida residence at 358 El Brillo Way.
A FedEx shipping label shows a shipment from Epstein's New York address (NY 10022) to his Palm Beach address, scheduled for delivery on September 20, 2005.
The document provides direct evidence of Epstein's personal acquisition of instructional materials related to BDSM and erotic servitude.
The order was paid for via American Express and had a total cost of $68.83.
